pullrequest.title: Backport wide angle camera background color fix

content.raw:
actually I think we don't need to delete the frame buffer as we we're only changing the FOV which should not affect the resulting image size. I believe the lines were added there so that the `saveFrameBuffer` can be created again later in `Camera::ReadPixelBuffer` to hold data for an image of different size.

I removed the lines in aa845e5
